patterns_discovered: Separate theme and style files for modularity
Dark mode implementation with data-theme attribute
Media queries for responsiveness and print styles
Accessibility-focused design with focus styles and skip links
gotchas_discovered: Complex color management across light and dark themes
Potential performance overhead from multiple CSS transitions
Need for consistent naming conventions in theme variables

changes_made: Created new CSS files with CloudOpsTools branding

recommendations: Consider extracting theme variables into a separate tokens file
Implement a CSS-in-JS solution for more dynamic theming
Add performance monitoring for CSS transitions
Create a design system documentation for consistent use of variables
